page.title: 13LEISURE
page.content: WE ARRIVED IN THE MINI-BUS AT BIRMINGHAM WELSH RUGBY CLUB IN CLOCK LANE BICKENHILL.WE FOLLOWED THE FOOTPATH SIGNS IN A WESTERLY DIRECTION.WE CROSSED THE STYLE INTO A FIELD OF ROUGH GRASSLAND.WE CAME TO A NARROW BROOK WITH A WOODEN PLANK ACROSS.WE CROSSED THE BROOK,SOME PEOPLE GOT THEIR FEET WET.THERE WERE TREES ON THE BANKS OF THE BROOK.WE CAME TO A CONSTRUCTION SITE,WITH TRACTORS,DIGGERS,AND WORKMEN BUILDING A ROAD,IT WAS MUDDY.WE FOLLOWED THE FIELD PATH TO CASTLE HILLS FARM. WE FOLLOWED THE GRASS ROAD TO THE DERELICT HARGRAEVES HALL, FOLLOWED THE FOOTPATH BY THE SIDE OF A WHEAT FIELD WITH A BARBED WIRE FENCE. WE FOLLOWED THE WHITE FENCE ON THE CIVIL SERVICE SPORTS FIELD TO THE LEFT, CONTINUING UP HILL SLIGHTLY WE CAME TO DUNSTAN FARM. CROSSED A BROOK OVER A BRIDGE.
